name: NIST 800-61 - Upfront Tasks
description: Creates tasks for incident response and handling as per the guidelines provided in NIST 800-61.

resource.name: Prioritize incident
resource.description: Prioritize handling the incident based on the relevant factors

resource.name: Identify and mitigate all vulnerabilities
resource.description: Identify and mitigate all vulnerabilities that were exploited

resource.name: Verify no other hosts are affected
resource.description: If more affected hosts are discovered, repeat the Detection and Analysis Steps

resource.name: Determine information impact
resource.description: Suggested Categories: None, Privacy breach, Proprietary breach, Integrity loss

resource.name: Implement additional monitoring
resource.description: If necessary, implement additional monitoring to look for future activity

resource.name: Create a follow up report
resource.description: If necessary, implement additional monitoring to look for future activity

resource.name: Determine recoverability effort
resource.description: Suggested categories: Regular, Supplemented, Extended, Not Recoverable

resource.name: Contain incident
resource.description: Report the incident to the appropriate internal personnel and external organizations

resource.name: Confirmed incident
resource.description: Confirmed incident - document the investigation and gather evidence. Attach all relevant information from detection steps to the case

resource.name: Validate restoration
resource.description: Confirm that the affected systems are functioning normally

resource.name: Removal of malicious content
resource.description: Removed malware, inappropriate materials and other components

resource.name: Report incident
resource.description: Report the incident to the the appropriate internal personnel and external organizations

resource.name: Determine if an Incident has occurred
Restore affected systems
resource.description: Return affected systems to an operationally ready state

resource.name: Lessons learned
resource.description: Hold a lesson learned meeting (mandatory for major incidents, optional otherwise)

routes.name: Post Incident Activity T1 -> Post Incident Activity T2
Analysis and Containment T6 -> Analysis and Containment T7
Recovery T3 -> Post Incident Activity T1
Analysis and Containment T1 -> Copy  of Analysis and Containment T1
Detection T5 -> Analysis and Containment T1
Analysis and Containment T5 -> Analysis and Containment T6
Analysis and Containment T3 -> Copy  of Analysis and Containment T4
Analysis and Containment T7 -> Eradicate T1
Analysis and Containment T2 -> Analysis and Containment T3
